attributes.title: WORST APP EVER TO EXIST

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and exactly 69 minutes later my mom, grandma, sister, and all of my cousins died. They did an autopsy, and the man said the cause of death was second hand embarrassment. The president single-handedly RUINED my life, and I was disowned by the rest my family. I am currently living on the street. My hamster died yesterday due to malnutrition because the only thing I am allowed to buy from the store is orange food, to be reminded of the person I voted for. I would also like to mention that when I first opened this app, I was greeted with a nude picture of the president getting a spray tan (it was microscopic). I am now legally blind due to the image being tattooed into my brain. Additionally, I would like to apologize to Melania Trump, due to the fact that the only good thing she is getting out of that relationship is money.
attributes.title: the cheetos canâ€™t help you now

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to open it up and see a very yucky Cheeto man staring at me I quickly closed it in horror. My eyes were bleeding and I was crying. Our family dog whom was right next to me on my left side was whining and growling heâ€™s eyes were watering and he was hiding under my pet rock named Cornelius. But it doesnâ€™t stop there Cornelius forgot to put on deodorant this morning and when my dog went to hide he smelled Cornelius and ran to the other side of the room the smell was horrific when my dog was running he ran into the desk that was holding my fish tank my dog has a concussion and then my fish bowl got knocked over and then my fish fell to the ground and my cat thatâ€™s allergic to fish ate the fish and died and now I donâ€™t have a fish cat and my dog is very sick also my rock died when he saw the Cheeto man when I opened the app. Lawsuit I say. Very disappointed in this app.
attributes.title: Yucky Cheeto man

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app hoping to stay informed with the trump campaign, register for rallies, and buy more merchandise. I just found out this app existed so I told everyone I know to download it too HOWEVER as soon as you open the app it glitches out and breaks your phone. When I opened it, It froze on the title screen so I went to the Apple store and they were unable to fix it, I ended up having to buy a new phone entirely so this app cost me over $700. The same happened to everyone I told to download it and they were all incredibly upset with me THIS APP RUINED MY LIFE! I lost the love of my life, I lost my job, I lost my kids, I lost my house, I lost my car, I even lost my dog and pet snail. As of right now Iâ€™m living on the streets borrowing a strangers phone to share this information with you please save yourself and
DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!
